t: Deliver Me, O Lord, from Evil Men
To the choirmaster. A Psalm of David.
Deliver*pn me, O Lord,*s from evil men; preserve*ld me from violent men,
who*ln plan evil things in their heart and*ld stir up wars continually.
They*ln make their tongue sharp as a serpentâ€™s, and*ld under their lips is the venom of asps. Selah*ig
Guard*pn me, O Lord,*s from the hands of the wicked; preserve*ld me from violent men, who*ld have planned to trip up my feet.
The*ln arrogant have hidden a trap for me, and*ld with cords they have spread a net; beside*ld the way they have set snares for me. Selah*ig
I*pn say to the Lord,*s You are my God; give*ld ear to the voice of my pleas for mercy, O Lord!*s
O*ln Lord,*s my Lord, the strength of my salvation, you*ld have covered my head in the day of battle.
Grant*ln not, O Lord,*s the desires of the wicked; do*ld not further their evil plot, or they will be exalted! Selah*ig
As*pn for the head of those who surround me, let*ld the mischief of their lips overwhelm them!
Let*ln burning coals fall upon them! Let*ld them be cast into fire, into*ld miry pits, no more to rise!
Let*ln not the slanderer be established in the land; let*ld evil hunt down the violent man speedily!
I*pn know that the Lord*s will maintain the cause of the afflicted, and*ld will execute justice for the needy.
Surely*ln the righteous shall give thanks to your name; the*ld upright shall dwell in your presence.
